column4: hi. I'm getting this error when I'm trying to install something E: Malformed line 5 in source list /etc/apt/sources.list (dist parse). can someone tell me what is the problem ?
could you give us line 5 of /etc/apt/sources.list?
try to put a hash sign # in front of this line
doesn't work... maybe i don't know where to put #
the line has to look like that: # http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/11870/
then you will have to do a sudo apt-get update on the command line
and if i'm not wrong the line 5 is: # See http://help.ubuntu.com/community/UpgradeNotes for how to upgrade to
shall i write another # in the front of # See * ?
no, could you instead upload your /etc/apt/sources.list to a pastebin?
can you run sudo apt-get update?
yes, I found it too, just this moment...
